const QString Empty
 A global empty string (note that this is ALSO NULL under Qt 3.x).

Detailed Description

A namespace for QString helper functions.

This namespace contains several helper functions that are used when dealing with QString.

Function Documentation

KVILIB_API int KviQString::cmpCI ( const QString &  sz1,
const QString &  sz2,
bool  bNonAlphaGreater = false 
)

Compares two strings with case insensitive.

Note that greater here means that come AFTER in the alphabetic order return < 0 ---> str1 < str2 return = 0 ---> str1 = str2 return > 0 ---> str1 > str2

Parameters:
sz1 The first string
sz2 The second string
bNonAlphaGreater Wheter to check if strings are not alphabetics
Returns:
int

Referenced by KviKvsVariant::compare(), KviKvsVariantComparison::compare_integer_string(), KviKvsVariantComparison::compare_real_string(), KviClassicWindowList::insertButton(), and KviUserListView::insertUserEntry().

QByteArray KviQString::toUtf8 ( const QString &  szSrc  )  [inline]

Return a UTF-8 formatted string.

Parameters:
szSrc The source string
Returns:
QByteArray
Warning:
: DO NOT USE CONSTRUCTS LIKE char * c = KviQString::toUtf8(something).data(); They are dangerous since with many compilers the returned string gets destroyed at the end of the instruction and the c pointer gets thus invalidated. Use QByteArray tmp = KviQString::toUtf8(something); char * c = tmp.data(); instead. Yes, I know that it sucks, but it's the only way to transit to Qt 4.x more or less cleanly...

Referenced by KviIrcView::add2Log(), KviSharedFilesManager::addSharedFile(), KviStr::append(), KviConsole::avatarChanged(), KviConsole::checkDefaultAvatar(), KviWindow::focusInEvent(), KviStringConversion::fromString(), KviLocale::getLoadedCatalogue(), KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver::haveServerIp(), kvi_irc_vsnprintf(), kvi_vsnprintf(), KviStr::KviStr(), KviThreadManager::KviThreadManager(), KviMessageCatalogue::load(), KviRegisteredChannelDataBase::load(), KviLocale::loadCatalogue(), KviIrcConnection::loginToIrcServer(), KviFileUtils::makeDir(), KviStr::operator=(), KviPackageWriter::packFile(), KviServerParser::parseCtcpRequest(), KviServerParser::parseNumericServerAdminInfoTitle(), KviServerParser::parseNumericStats(), KviRegisteredUserDataBase::removeUser(), KviDnsThread::run(), KviHttpRequestThread::runInternal(), KviFile::save(), KviConfig::save(), KviIrcView::saveBuffer(), KviNetUtils::stringIpToBinaryIp(), KviStringConversion::toString(), KviLocale::unloadCatalogue(), and KviFileUtils::writeFile().
